00276     def CreateWorkspaceBrowser(self):
00277         tree = wx.TreeCtrl(self, -1, wx.Point(0, 0), wx.Size(160, 250),
00278                            wx.TR_DEFAULT_STYLE | wx.NO_BORDER)
00279         root = tree.AddRoot("AUI Project")
00280         items = []
00281         imglist = wx.ImageList(16, 16, True, 2)
00282         imglist.Add(wx.ArtProvider_GetBitmap(wx.ART_FOLDER, wx.ART_OTHER, wx.Size(16,16)))
00283         imglist.Add(wx.ArtProvider_GetBitmap(wx.ART_NORMAL_FILE, wx.ART_OTHER, wx.Size(16,16)))
00284         tree.AssignImageList(imglist)
00285         items.append(tree.AppendItem(root, "Item 1", 0))
00286         items.append(tree.AppendItem(root, "Item 2", 0))
00287         for ii in xrange(len(items)):
00288             id = items[ii]
00289             tree.AppendItem(id, "Subitem 1", 1)
00290             tree.AppendItem(id, "Subitem 2", 1)
00291         tree.Expand(root)
00292         return tree

00294     def CreateSizeReportCtrl(self, width=80, height=80):
00295         return SizeReportCtrl(self, -1, wx.DefaultPosition, wx.Size(width, height), self._mgr_mgr)
00296     
00297     def OnLoadColumnFile(self, event):
00298         import os
00299         wildcard = "All files (*)|*"
00300         dlg = wx.FileDialog(
00301             self, message="Choose a file",
00302             defaultDir=os.getcwd(), 
00303             defaultFile="",
00304             wildcard=wildcard,
00305             style=wx.OPEN | wx.MULTIPLE | wx.CHANGE_DIR)
00306         
00307         # Show the dialog and retrieve the user response. If it is the OK response, 
00308         # process the data.
00309         if dlg.ShowModal() == wx.ID_OK:
00310             # This returns a Python list of files that were selected.
00311             paths = dlg.GetPaths()
00312             #parse the files
00313             for file in paths:
00314                 x,y=self.extractColumnsextractColumns(file)
00315                 self.backendWrapbackendWrap.addLine(x, y)    
00316         dlg.Destroy()
00317             
00318     def extractColumns(self,filename):
00319         'gets the columns from a file and returns them as arrays'
00320         f=file(filename,'r')
00321         lines=f.readlines()
00322         x=[];y=[]
00323         for line in lines:
00324             if line[0]=="#":continue 
00325             words=line.split()
00326             x.append(float(words[0]))
00327             y.append(float(words[1]))
00328 #            from decimal import Decimal
00329 #            x.append(float(Decimal(eval(words[0]))))
00330 #            y.append(float(Decimal(eval(words[1]))))
00331         import numpy as nx
00332         return nx.array(x),nx.array(y)

00366     def OnSettings(self, event):
00367         # show the settings pane, and float it
00368         floating_pane = self._mgr_mgr.GetPane("settings").Float().Show()
00369         if floating_pane.floating_pos == wx.DefaultPosition:
00370             floating_pane.FloatingPosition(self.GetStartPositionGetStartPosition())
00371         self._mgr_mgr.Update()
00372                 
00373     def OnCreatePerspective(self, event):
00374         dlg = wx.TextEntryDialog(self, "Enter a name for the new perspective:", "AUI Test")
00375         dlg.SetValue(("Perspective %d")%(len(self._perspectives_perspectives)+1))
00376         if dlg.ShowModal() != wx.ID_OK:
00377             return
00378         if len(self._perspectives_perspectives) == 0:
00379             self._perspectives_menu_perspectives_menu.AppendSeparator()
00380         self._perspectives_menu_perspectives_menu.Append(ID_FirstPerspective + len(self._perspectives_perspectives), dlg.GetValue())
00381         self._perspectives_perspectives.append(self._mgr_mgr.SavePerspective())
00382 
00383     def OnCopyPerspective(self, event):
00384         s = self._mgr_mgr.SavePerspective()
00385         if wx.TheClipboard.Open():
00386             wx.TheClipboard.SetData(wx.TextDataObject(s))
00387             wx.TheClipboard.Close()
00388         
00389     def OnRestorePerspective(self, event):
00390         self._mgr_mgr.LoadPerspective(self._perspectives_perspectives[event.GetId() - ID_FirstPerspective])
00391 
00392     def GetStartPosition(self):
00393         self.xx = self.xx + 20
00394         x = self.xx
00395         pt = self.ClientToScreen(wx.Point(0, 0))
00396         return wx.Point(pt.x + x, pt.y + x)

00400 def runGraphics():
00401     # Make a frame to show it
00402     app = wx.PySimpleApp()
00403     frame = MainPlotWindow(None, wx.ID_ANY, "Graphics", size=(1110, 590))
00404     #frame = wx.Frame(None,-1,'Plottables')
00405     #plotter = Plotter(frame)
00406     frame.Show()
00407     app.MainLoop()
00408 
00409 if __name__ == "__main__":
00410     runGraphics()
